channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Investors cry foul over former NYC Mayor Eric Adams’s crypto launch: ‘Such an obvious rug’
item.description: Adams’s new cryptocurrency has all the makings of a scam known as a rugpull.

item.description: Why is it only a 'crisis' when a spending program expires on Republicans’ watch?

item.title: Why Sex Differences Matter in Women’s Sports

item.title: Will Washington Learn the Lessons of Tiananmen in Tehran?
item.description: If he chooses to stand by while Iran burns, Donald Trump runs the risk of repeating his predecessors’ mistakes.

item.title: Are American College Students Brilliantly Disabled?
item.description: More students are reporting disabilities — and getting A’s.
